title: Dogger's Christmas
description: "Shirley Hughes is a national treasure" Philip PullmanOver 40 years after Dogger was published, comes this magical seasonal sequel: Dogger's Christmas.It's that special time of year: Christmas.The time of carol-singing, tree-decorating, and of course lots of presents. But in the excitement of new toys, will Dave forget about his old friend, Dogger?The very special story of one boy and his beloved toy - who always manages to be found..."This is Hughes' most heartwarming picture book . . . Hughes has a kindly, inexhaustible eye - she misses nothing" Observer.
author: Shirley Hughes
